meanings.sent1: She exultantly jumped up and down in excitement.
meanings.sent2: The team exultantly celebrated their victory on the field.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail exultantly after finding its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed exultantly under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The children laughed exultantly as they played in the park.

meanings.sent5: The students exultantly received their diplomas at the graduation ceremony.
